titles.title: A resolution condemning the horrific attack in Indianapolis, Indiana, on April 15, 2021, and expressing support and prayers for all of those impacted by that tragedy.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
This resolution condemns the attack that led to the loss of eight lives in Indianapolis, Indiana, on April 15, 2021.
It honors the memory of the victims who were killed.
It expresses hope for the recovery of the individuals who were injured.
